title: PTA
description: Program for Profile Tracking Analysis - estimates nonlinear trajectories through smoothing splines.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Input data file in table format (data frame structure of long format in R)

model_formula.title: Model formula
model_formula.description: Model formulation through multilevel smoothing splines

vt_formulation.title: Varying terms formulation
vt_formulation.description: Specify varying smoothing terms. Two components are required: the first one 'var' indicates the variable (e.g., subject) around which the smoothing will vary while the second component specifies the smoothing formulation (e.g., s(age,subject)).

prediction_table.title: Prediction table
prediction_table.description: Data table to generate predicted values for graphical illustration

verbosity_level.title: Verbosity level
verbosity_level.description: Verbosity level (0 for quiet, 1 or more for talkative)

response_var.title: Response variable
response_var.description: Column name designated as the response/outcome variable (default is 'Y')

dbg_args.title: Debug Args
dbg_args.description: Enable R to save parameters for debugging
